title: Typo in Go memory model doc
body: Hello, looks like there is a typo in docs â€“ in Go memory model document the word `serialize` used instead of `synchronize` in 2 places: [first line](https://github.com/golang/go/blob/bc33dd7432369b3abd2a6fd75cb57d6c5c3defa7/doc/go_mem.html#L29) and [second](https://github.com/golang/go/blob/bc33dd7432369b3abd2a6fd75cb57d6c5c3defa7/doc/go_mem.html#L33)
